text: Letpao Haokip is an Indian politician and member of the National People's Party. Haokip was first elected as a member of the Manipur Legislative Assembly from Chandel constituency in Chandel District as a National People's Party candidate in 2017. Currently he is the State Minister for Irrigation and Flood Control (IFC). ==History== * Elected MLA from 41 Chandel(ST) A/C, 11th Manipur Legislative Assembly 2017. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Manipur Legislative Assembly Category:National People's Party (India) politicians Category:Manipur politicians Category:Manipur MLAs 2017– Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Letpao Haokip
